title: Linear Interpolation Function
description: This function calculates the linear interpolation value based on two given points (X1, Y1) and (X2, Y2) for a specified value X.
name: F_LIN2

input.name: X
input.description: The independent variable for which the interpolation is calculated.

input.name: X1
input.description: The X coordinate of the first point.

input.name: Y1
input.description: The Y coordinate of the first point.

input.name: X2
input.description: The X coordinate of the second point.

input.name: Y2
input.description: The Y coordinate of the second point.

return_value.description: The interpolated Y value corresponding to the input X value.
